metadata.description: Designed by Chris Wahl, the “Heroes Follow Heroes” commemorative token features Beam vs Sly engaged in battle, overlaid against the MetaHero Universe logo.  Surrounding the image is text commemorating the contest. This NFT is an art collectible independent of the official Pixel Vault ecosystem. As such, no secondary sale royalties will be received by Pixel Vault.
metadata.name: Heroes Follow Heroes 2021
